snippet.title: Paranautical Activity: Double Atonement Edition - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
Originally developed by Code Avarice, the game was originally booted off Steam. The reason for its temporary delisting was because the original developer was acting like a douchebag and sent death threats to Valve's CEO, Gabe Newell. The main developer was kicked out, but thanks to Digerati Distribution buying the IP off of Code Avarice, the game returned to Steam with the "Double Atonement Edition", which adds 1 new level type, 1 new weapon, 1 new item, wallpapers, developer footage and commentary and pro guide that gives you everything to know to master the game. Thanks to Digerati, the game also saw a release on GOG, PS4, PS Vita, Xbox One, 3DS*, Wii U* and Nintendo Switch.

Paranautical Activity (C) Digerati Distribution
Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/250580/Paranautical_Activity_Deluxe_Atonement_Edition/

*Due to the Wii U and 3DS eShops being officially shut down by Nintendo, it's no longer possible to get the game on either platform in a legal manner, as it's a digital-only game. It's still available on Switch, though.
